item.title: Social Media Video Editor (Facebook & IG Ads) - Upwork
item.description:

Looking for someone who has done a lot of FB&IG video ads for ONLINE BUSINESSES.

Need fast turnaround time.

And video ads right away as we get started, so you need to have some availability as well.  

Pay will be per video basis.

Looking forward to working with ya :)

item.title: 3D Video Creation for Outdoor Screen - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled 3D video creator to produce a captivating video for our brand and company. The video will be displayed on an outdoor screen with dimensions of 40640X960mm. The main objective is to create a visually stunning video that effectively showcases our products and services to a large audience. The ideal candidate should have experience in 3D animation, video editing, and motion graphics. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work under tight deadlines are important qualities for this project.

Skills required:
- 3D animation
- Video editing
- Motion graphics
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

Size: Large
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $50

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Responsibilities and Duties

• Develop and implement social media strategies across a range of clients.

• Full management of social media presence for multiple clients including planning, writing, scheduling and reporting of content.

• Develop trusted partnerships with key clients who attend and lead planning meetings.

• A trusted expert in social media and content marketing.

• An understanding of how to communicate cybersecurity and tech products or services. .

• Support and collaborate with content creators, clients and other team members.

• Create and edit content in the form of video, graphics and photography.

• Support behind-the-scenes for AVC and client content creation days for video, podcast and photography production.

• Have a presence within the Cheltenham business and cybersecurity communities to raise the profile of Alice Violet Creative.

• Guide and manage the social media presence of Alice Violet Creative.

Skills and Experience Required for the Role

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills

• Excellent time management and organisational skills

• A creative approach to digital and content marketing

• 2 years experience in managing multiple social media accounts either in-house or for an agency.

• Experience in creating various digital content for social media such as video, photography, graphics and written content.

• An interest in learning new skills and technologies and growing with the needs of the role and company.

• Ability to prioritise client deliverables.

• Experience using a social media management tool such as Hootsuite.

• An understanding of wider social media optimisations such as SEO.

• Knowledgeable in the current and future trends in social media.

• Experience using Canva.

Experience Preferred for the Role (not essential)

• Content creation can be in the form of video, audio, photography, or articles.

• Experience working at a tech or cybersecurity company.

• Experience working for a start-up or busy agency.

• Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) for websites and social media.

• Adobe Creative Cloud: Audition, Premiere Pro, Photoshop.

• Podcasting or professional content production.

Please can you send across some examples of the accounts you managed and content you have created?

Thanks


Posted On: June 22, 2024 16:04 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Need powerful event opener video with young male (20's) voiceover like the sample - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to create a video like this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EkxXQLsDjXw

Our script it attached and backing music will be provided.
We prefer to use (ideally) a young (20 something or so) african american male voice if possible.

We need a video like the reference provided but that aligns more with our message of sharing God's light and letting yourself SHINE.

This will be played in a theatre for a teen audience and presented as the opening sequence for the weekend motivational event.

Each audience member will be wearing an LED bracelet which we will be programming along with the message to connect them even more.

Concept:

The theatre will start in blackness.
The video similar to the referenece will play (powerful visuals, narration and audio) using the script and music provided.
Then (and we're open to your creative input) - we think it would be cool after the powerful last line of the script "TONIGHT.  LET.  US.  SHINE" if the theatre went black again and just the sound of a heartbeat started, with the bracelets beating along with the heart, or maybe a visual countdown on a black screen to the event starting with the bracelets beating along with the countdown timer.

Looking for your ideas on how to make this the best it can be.
Thanks!



Posted On: June 22, 2024 16:01 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Production, Audio Editing, Voice-Over
Skills: Audio Production, Audio Editing, Voice-Over
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Creative person (Facebook Ads) - Upwork
item.description:
Dear,

For our German and Danish dropshipping business we are looking forward to hit 7 figures this year. Therefore we are looking for a highly developed Photo Editor with experience in Dropshipping in Shopify to be part of a new team in our organization. Your job will be to elevate our current photo’s and sometimes small video edits, to make some outstanding creatives in order to advertise on Facebook!


Please answer the following questions, if you are interested.

- Do you have experience working with Shopify?
- Do you have experience with Slack?
- Do you have experience in Canva?
- Do you have experience in Google Drive?
- Are you able to work structured, properly communicating in Slack?
- Can you work according to OUR strategy?
- Are you available for 4-6 hours a day, 5-6 days a week?


As a Photo Editor you have:

- Experience in Canva (Must)
- Good communication skills(Must!)
- Experience with working with workflows, video trainings
- Experience with different communication platforms (slack)

If you do not meet the requirements, do not apply. (thank you)

Your duties will be:

- Creating new creatives for our products (Multiple daily)
- Working and communicating in Slack
- Being aware of the process and making sure there are no delays.


* WORKFLOW IS PROVIDED THROUGH EVERY STEP OF THE PROCESS
* CAREER OPPORTUNITIES IN THE TEAM
* VIDEO TRAINING IS PROVIDED AS WELL

If you think you are the right person for this job and you are able to contribute to our company, please respond to this post.

Best regards,

Nick


Hourly Range: $5.00-$7.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 16:01 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Clothing, Landing Page, Image Editing, Ad Creative
Skills: Clothing, Landing Page, Image Editing, Ad Creative
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for TikTok and YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can take raw footage and create engaging TikTok clips and YouTube interviews. In total we have two interviews - less than 5 mins each.

The editor should have a strong understanding of both platforms and be able to edit videos to suit their specific requirements.

The editor must have experience with TikTok trends, transitions, caption words and effects to create eye-catching clips that resonate with our target audience. Additionally, the editor should be able to edit longer interviews into concise and impactful YouTube videos.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Knowledge of TikTok trends and effects
    - Proficiency in editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro)
    - Creativity and attention to detail

    This is a medium-sized project that will require editing multiple videos for both TikTok and YouTube. The duration of the project is expected to be 1  month, however we plan to make this a series and hope you'll join us for the ride. We are looking for an intermediate level video editor with experience in creating content for social media platforms.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 22, 2024 15:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Development
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for Website - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to enhance and edit an older 30-minute mp4 video. The video contains 3 interviews that need to be transformed into 3 shorter clips suitable for attaching to our website. The editor will be responsible for improving the overall quality of the video and ensuring a seamless viewing experience. Attention to detail and the ability to capture the essence of each interview is crucial.    

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Audio editing
- Transitions and effects
- Color correction
- Storytelling

This is a medium-sized project that can be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level expert who has experience in video editing for websites.

Budget: $70

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Looking for a video editor in the military niche - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor:

We run a TikTok/YouTube channel focused on military videos and are seeking a talented video editor to join our team.

We will provide the video script and voiceover, and your task will be to edit the videos. The length of the videos will be around 60 seconds each.

We’re aiming for a long-term collaboration, so if you’re interested, please let me know. I can send you some samples of the type of videos we produce so you can see if it’s a good fit for you.

If you have experience editing TikTok/YouTube videos, please attach samples of your previous work.

Here are some example channels similar to ours:

https://www.tiktok.com/@gunnerstories/video/7371929357222202656

https://www.tiktok.com/@armedstories/video/7380845498753699105

https://www.tiktok.com/@military.tales/video/7357103915667688736

the payment will be 5$ a video and we will order 14 a week (70$ a week).

Looking forward to the possibility of working together!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 22, 2024 15:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
